q: He also wants to see Barack Obama take steps to reduce the deficit by closing loopholes in corporate tax laws and reducing unnecessary defense spending before considering cuts to education, health care or Social Security. But this is really not very funny: On Jan. 28, as protesters clashed with police early on in the turmoil and burned down the adjacent headquarters of Mr Mubarak's ruling party, a handful of looters climbed a fire escape to the Cairo museum roof and lowered themselves on ropes from a glass-paneled ceiling onto the museum's top floor. There was a senator named Barack Obama who ran for president of the United States on exactly that position, Sen. Bernie Sanders said.
